nodes.text: Darragh O'Farrell is the Senior Manager of Audio at LucasArts. He is credited as the voice-over director for Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic, Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic II: The Sith Lords, and Star Wars: Demolition. He also worked as voice director for Star Wars: The Force Unleashed, Star Wars: The Force Unleashed: Ultimate Sith Edition, Star Wars: Jedi Knight: Dark Forces II, the Star Wars Episode III: Revenge of the Sith video game, Star Wars: Rogue Squadron II: Rogue Leader, and Soulcalibur IV. O'Farrell was on-staff as voice department manager for Star Wars: Rogue Squadron and Star Wars Battlefront: Renegade Squadron. In addition, he was creditied as both the voice director and voice producer in Star Wars: Jedi Knight: Mysteries of the Sith, Star Wars: X-Wing vs. TIE Fighter, Star Wars: Masters of Teräs Käsi, Star Wars: X-Wing Alliance, the Star Wars Episode I: The Phantom Menace video game, Star Wars Episode I: The Gungan Frontier, Star Wars Episode I: Racer, Star Wars: Obi-Wan, Star Wars: Super Bombad Racing, and Star Wars: The Clone Wars.

He also worked on Star Wars: DroidWorks, Star Wars: Force Commander, Star Wars: Starfighter Star Wars: Jedi Starfighter, Star Wars: Galactic Battlegrounds, Star Wars: Racer Revenge, Star Wars: Jedi Knight II: Jedi Outcast, Star Wars: Racer Revenge, Star Wars: Bounty Hunter, Star Wars: Galactic Battlegrounds: Clone Campaigns, Star Wars: Rogue Squadron III: Rebel Strike, Star Wars Galaxies, Star Wars Galaxies: Jump to Lightspeed, Star Wars Trilogy: Apprentice of the Force, Star Wars: Battlefront, Star Wars: Republic Commando, Star Wars Galaxies: Rage of the Wookiees, Star Wars Galaxies: The Complete Online Adventures, Star Wars: Battlefront II, Star Wars: Lethal Alliance, Star Wars: Empire at War, Star Wars: Empire at War: Forces of Corruption, LEGO Star Wars II: The Original Trilogy, LEGO Star Wars: The Complete Saga, Star Wars: The Clone Wars: Republic Heroes, and was involved with the Star Wars Galaxies Trading Card Game.
He is currently involved in the production of Star Wars: The Old Republic.
